events.name: WPNDIST
events.comment: Distance to the next waypoint (entities spawn)

events.name: nextMode
events.comment: Next mode the player is expected to be in

children.text: Setup the game.
Create pool of trees.
Make camera smoothly rotate towards the player.
Hide tutorial when the screen is tapped/clicked.
Move the world, every tick.
Spawn tree when ground has sufficiently moved.
Destroy entities when they go too far outside of gameplay area.
Move trees that are in-game.
Move trees back to the pool when they go too far outside of gameplay area.
Pick 2 trees from the pool and place them on the road.

children.functionDescription: Pick 2 trees from the pool and place them on the road

functionParameters.name: y
functionParameters.comment: Y coordinate to spawn the tree

children.text: Left side.
Right side.
Create trees that are already placed on start of layout.

children.functionDescription: Create trees that are already placed on start of layout

children.text: Create initial trees.
Move the player to the touch position.
Player took a hit.
Game over.
Spawn new obstacle, portals and coins.

children.functionDescription: Spawn new obstacle, portals and coins

children.name: obstacleType
children.comment: Type of the obstacle to spawn

children.name: otherPortalType
children.comment: Type of the other portal to spawn (the first portal has to match the obstacle.)

children.name: invertPosition
children.comment: Should the correct portal be on the right?

children.text: Spawn coins before the portal.
Set random numbers.
Spawn rock, wolf portal and a random portal.
Spawn wood, lizard portal and a random portal.
Spawn big rock, bird portal and a random portal.
Periodically spawn entities.
If player is a wolf and collides with jump area of rock obstacle, perform a jump.
Player loses a life if hit vines as a bird.
Player loses a life if hit wood as a wolf.
Player loses a life if hit rock as a lizard.
Player loses a life if hit rock as a lizard or wolf.
Morph into lizard.
Morph into wolf.
Morph into bird.
When smoke's animation finishes playing, smoke billboard objects are destroyed.
Player collects coins on collision.

actions.text: Add 1 to score and update text.
